Digital Diagnosis Method

Modern Digital Diagnosis for Precision Treatment

Our clinic combines AI-assisted imaging with doctor expertise to deliver accurate assessments — even remotely. Fast, precise, and scientifically informed.

How it works

How Our Digital Diagnosis Works

1. Upload Photos

Patients securely upload affected-area photos (skin/hair/scalp) through our portal.

2. AI-Assisted Analysis

Advanced AI scans images for inflammation, density, pigmentation & pattern changes.

3. Doctor Evaluation

Our specialist reviews the AI insights alongside medical history & symptoms.

4. Digital Report

A detailed report is generated outlining diagnosis, triggers & recommended care plan.

Tools We Use for Diagnosis

High-Resolution Photo Capture

Accurate tracking of scalp, skin & symptom progression.

AI Pattern Recognition

Detects density, texture irregularities & inflammation patterns.

Doctor-Verified Review

All findings validated manually by certified homeopathic doctors.

Remote vs In-Clinic Diagnosis

Digital (Remote)

  • Upload photos anytime
  • AI + doctor review
  • No travel required
  • Ideal for mild to moderate conditions

In-Clinic (Physical)

  • In-depth scalp/skin analysis
  • Real-time doctor evaluation
  • Physical examination tools
  • Best for severe/complex cases

Start Your Digital Diagnosis Today

Upload photos & get your doctor-reviewed report within 24 hours.
